com.percussion.loader.extractor
Class PSItemExtractor

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.loader.extractor.PSExtractor
      com.percussion.loader.extractor.PSItemExtractor
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPSItemExtractor, IPSPlugin, IPSUIPlugin
public abstract class PSItemExtractor
extends PSExtractor

This class contains convenient methods for most item extractors. The derived class must implement the extractItems method, which is defined in IPSItemExtractor. The GUI configuration panel is empty, which can be customized by overriding the PSExtractor.getConfigurationUI() method.

Method Detail

deleteChildEntries

protected void deleteChildEntries(PSClientItem clientItem)
Set delete action to all child entries for the specified client item.

Parameters:
clientItem - The client item, it may not be null.

evaluateXPath

protected String[] evaluateXPath(com.percussion.xml.PSXPathEvaluator xpathEval,
                                 String XPath)
                          throws com.icl.saxon.expr.XPathException
Evaluates the specified XPath expression.

Parameters:
xpathEval - The XPath evaluator, it may not be null.
XPath - The XPath expression, it may not be null or empty.
Returns:
The values of the evaluated nodes as array of String. It will never be null. The array will contain at least one element, which may be an empty string, but not null.
Throws:
com.icl.saxon.expr.XPathException - if an error occurs while evaluating the XPath.

setFieldValue

protected void setFieldValue(PSItemField itemField,
                             com.percussion.loader.objectstore.PSFieldProperty fieldProperty,
                             PSVariableEvaluator varEval)
                      throws IOException
Convenient method calls setFieldValue(PSItemField, PSFieldProperty, PSVariableEvaluator, null)

Throws:
IOException - if an error occurs while evaluating the variable-expression.
IllegalStateException - if xpathEval is null but the value type of fieldProperty is PSFieldProperty.VALUE_TYPE_XPATH.

setFieldValue

protected void setFieldValue(PSItemField itemField,
                             com.percussion.loader.objectstore.PSFieldProperty fieldProperty,
                             PSVariableEvaluator varEval,
                             com.percussion.xml.PSXPathEvaluator xpathEval)
                      throws com.icl.saxon.expr.XPathException,
                             IOException
Evaluates the specified value-expression and set the evaluated value for the specified item field, which is a top level field, not a child field.

Parameters:
itemField - The item field (non-child field), its value will be set to the evaluated result. It may not be null.
fieldProperty - The field property that contains the to be evaluated value-expression. It may not be null.
varEval - The evaluator for extractor-variable, it may not be null.
xpathEval - The Evaluator for XPath expression, it may be null.
Throws:
IOException - if an error occurs while evaluating the variable-expression.
IllegalStateException - if xpathEval is null but the value type of fieldProperty is PSFieldProperty.VALUE_TYPE_XPATH.
com.icl.saxon.expr.XPathException - if an error occurs while evaluating the XPath expression.

getField

protected PSItemField getField(PSClientItem clientItem,
                               String fieldName)
Get a item field for the specified field, not a field in a child item within the specified client item.

Parameters:
clientItem - The client item that contains the specified field. It may not be null.
fieldName - The name of the specified field. It may not be null or empty.
Returns:
The specified item field. It never be null.
Throws:
RuntimeException - if the specified field does not exist in clientItem.
